company.value: name of the company as a string

village.value: name of the village as a string

longitude.value: longitudinal coordinates of the village as a number

latitude.value: latitudinal coordinates of the village as a number

end_date.value: date when the project implementation is completed as a string

start_date.value: date when the project implementation begins as a string

duration.value: total duration between the start and end date as a number in total days

capex.value: project capital expenditures as a number

opex.value: project operational expenditures as a number

sus_plan.value: a description of their sustainability plan as a string

total_cost.value: total funding required by the project as a number

num_houses.value: number of houses in the village as a number

co2.value: number of co2 predicted emissions avoided as a number

pue.value: a description of the productive uses of energy the project hopes to bring as a string

ppl.value: number of people in the village as a number
